subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Second-ranked Novak Djokovic won his quarterfinal against Juan Martín del Potro, 6-2, 7-6 (3), 6-4, in front of a packed Arthur Ashe Stadium.
snippet: Second-ranked Novak Djokovic won his quarterfinal against Juan Martín del Potro, 6-2, 7-6 (3), 6-4, in front of a packed Arthur Ashe Stadium.
